content: 2 4 6 6 6 stitches into the newly cast continue to knit in the round using your main on underarm stitches there are now a total of 36 colour until the sweater body measures 3 5 4 5 40 42 46 52 stitches on your needles place a 6 6 inches or 9 10 12 5 15 15 cm measuring marker for the beginning of the round in the from the new cast on stitches in the underarm or middle of the new underarm stitches knit one until the body is 1 1 1 25 1 5 1 5 or 2 5 2 5 3 complete round in your main colour 4 4 cm shorter than your desired length change to smaller ribbing circular needles and if change to smaller ribbing circular needles and if using a contrast colour for your ribbing attach using a contrast colour for your ribbing attach cc knit one round in your contrast colour and cc knit one round in your contrast colour and then work 0 75 0 75 1 1 1 or 2 2 2 5 2 5 2 5 then work 1 1 1 25 1 5 1 5 or 2 5 2 5 3 4 4 cm of single rib *k1 p1* cm of single rib *k1 p1* bind off in pattern using a stretchy bind off i bind off in pattern using a stretchy bind off i recommend jennie s super stretchy bind off recommend jennie s super stretchy bind off you can find a video for this bind off technique you can find a video for this bind off technique here here repeat for the second sleeve weave in all ends and block lightly according to the dimensions of your chosen size the colour block boxy tee - victoria lewis - tiny teal handcrafted - copyright 2021 9 the colour block boxy tee - victoria lewis - tiny teal handcrafted - copyright 2021 10
